snippet.title: One Lonely Outpost - Official Early Access Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2022
snippet.description:
Start a farming colony and grow it into a vibrant community. Choose from traditional animals and natural produce or opt for robo-cows and gene-spliced crops. You can take a break from farming by mining, socializing with colonists, finding a love interest, exploring alien ruins, and so much more!

Note: The footage shown in the trailer was taken from an in-development version of the game and doesn't represent the finished product.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1465550/One_Lonely_Outpost/

#IGN #Gaming #IGNSummerOfGaming
